CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 6, 1948, pg. 3, reads: "Tech Students Honored - Two Carnegie Institute of Technology drama seniors, George D. Corrin Jr., left, and James H. McGiffin, center, recently received the Apell Memorial Awards from Henry F. Boettcher, head of the department of drama at the institute. Corrin is the son of Mr. and Mrs. G. D. Corrin St. of East Orange, N. J., and McGiffin resides at 1331 Fallowfield Avenue, Pittsburgh. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Carnegie Tech drama students James H. McGiffin, George D. Corrin Jr. shaking hands with woman, and man wearing plaid jacket, in interior with Roman backdrop
